transcript: Good morning everyone. Today I'm testing this microphone to make sure the sound is clear, balanced and without any background noise. Speaking naturally helps check how well the mic captures the tone, clarity and small details in the voice. If you can hear every word distinctly, the setup is working perfectly.

Imagine you're standing by the beach, hearing the waves crash against the shore. The sound fades and you start speaking softly, then gradually raise your voice to match the rhythm of the sea. This kind of recording helps both soft and loud tones, showing how the microphone handles different voice very clearly.
Namaste mehboobas yeh dekh rahi Hoon Ki meri aawaz Ki setup me kesi sunai deta hai mehbulkul naal Mal gati se bol rahiyo taki Mai kharsab ko tikse pad sake uh dekhte hai nati Jae kaise aata hai.
Aaj Mohsenbach achcha hai Mein abeke recording karahi Hu AAP meri aawas clearly sunbar hai kya mujhe bolne ka test karna hai Mai tixe kaum kar raha hai anahi.
